flawed_nl_solution:
He needs to walk 63000 steps in a week because 7 x 9000 = <<7*9000=63000>>63000
He has 181000 steps to walk on Friday and Saturday because 63000 - 9400 - 9100 - 8300 - 9200 - 8900 = <<63000-9400-9100-8300-9200-8900=181000>>181000
He needs to walk an average of 90500 on Friday and Saturday because 181000 / 2 = <<181000/2=90500>>90500
#### 90500

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18100, not 181000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
